record.title: HONORING THE VALUABLE WORK OF THE "WELCOME HOME A HERO" PROGRAM

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Armed Services be discharged from further consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 391) recognizing the employees of Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport, the North Texas Commission, USO, and the people and businesses of North Texas for their dedication to the "Welcome Home a Hero" program, and ask for its immediate consideration in the House.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Texas?
record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:
